name: TsunadeBot [WA-Multi Device]
description: A WhatsApp chatbot that offers various services through an automated conversational experience.

AUTO_READ.description: Would you like the bot to automatically sends read receipts for incoming messages? üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

AUTO_TYPE.description: Would you like the bot to automatically sends typing in personal & group chats? (Fake typing action) üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

AUTO_RECORD.description: Would you like the bot to automatically sends recording in personal & group chats? (Fake recording action) üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

AUTO_BLOCK_212.description: Would you like the bot to automatically remove Morocco(212) numbers from groups (There could be geographical, political, security, or market-related reasons for restricting access to certain platforms in Morocco.) üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

AUTO_KICK_212.description: Put your Heroku api key Here , Get one from here https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

OPENAI_APIKEY.description: Enter the api key of openai, for using gpt command for generate text from prompt using GPT-3.5-Turbo language model. Get your api key from: https://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

TIME_ZONE.description: Enter the timezone of your country, leave it empty for use GMT(Greenwich Mean time). Get your timezone from https://github.com/mznking/TsundeBot-MD#assets/timezone/timezones.json üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Provide the number of bot owner here. (Owner vCard) üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

OWNER_NAME.description: Provide the name of bot owner here. (Owner vCard) üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

LOCATION.description: Provide the location of bot owner. (Owner vCard) üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

SUDO_NUMBERS.description: Provide the numbers of sudo users. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

BOT_GROUP.description: Provide the link of bot group. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

REACTION_NUMBER.description: Provide the number of user to automatically react. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

REACTION_EMOJI.description: Provide the emoji for react automatically. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

PACK_NAME.description: Provide the pack name of sticker made by bot. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

AUTHOR_NAME.description: Provide the author name of sticker made by bot. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è

CREATOR_JID.description: Provide the jid of bot developer. üßö‚ù§Ô∏è
